author: ericjohnson
msg: finished up admonisions chapter and started linking chapter

author: dkulp
msg: * Update Phase to implement Comparable as well as hasCode and equals methods (to it can be used in hashmaps, tremaps, etc...)
* Update PhaseInterceptorChain to use an internal ListIterator to loop through interceptors (and for unwind)

* Make PhaseInterceptorChain re-entrant-ish.   An interceptor can now do "msg.getInterceptorChain().doIntercept(msg)" to force the rest of the chain to run, then come back to the current stack position.   Basically, it allows the "interceptor calls next" pattern, but doesn't require it.

author: dkulp
msg: Start of getting output chain working
* Change phases for outgoing messages (still work to go there)
* Add interceptors for closing the output connection/streams
* Work on building up output chain for soap (not nearly working yet)

author: dkulp
msg: * Add a 10sec timeout to the read.   If the response isn't back in 10 secs, fail the test.

author: dkulp
msg: Fix some issues with the LocalConduit
